title: The BIGGEST vs SMALLEST Gaming PC
description: Shop Top Deals:  Overland Park Home Page:  New Customers Exclusive - Get the Creality Ender 3d Pro for $99 after coupon:  Submit your Build to Micro Centers Build Showcase:    Shop AMD Ryzen 5 5600G:  Shop Gigabyte X570SI Pro AX DDR4 AMD AM4 Mini-ITX Motherboard:  Shop Corsair Vengeance LPX 16GB DDR4 RAM:  Shop PowerSpec 650W Power Supply:  Shop PowerColor AMD Radeon RX 6500 XT ITX GPU:  Shop Crucial P3 Plus 500GB M.2 Internal SSD:  Shop Cooler Master MasterAir RGB CPU Cooler:    Additional Parts:   Inland iK100 USB Keyboard:  Inland PSU Sleeved Extension Kit:  iFixit 64 Bit Driver Kit:  GAEMS Vanguard Personal Gaming Environment:  NTE 9.84ft Flexible Neon EL Wire 2.33mm:  NTE Electronics Wire Batter Power Supply AA Batteries:  NTE Electronics Switch Round Pushbutton:  Schmartboard Inc. 9 Male to Female Jumper Wires with Headers:  Inland HDMI Male to HDMI Male 24k Gold Plated Ethernet 12ft:  Duracell 4-Pack AA Rechargeable Batteries:   Shoutout to @mryeester for holding it down on camera with me!  Subscribe for more!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:   Chapter Titles: 0:00 The PC Challenge Begins 1:41 Building the Gaming PCs 4:37 The "Secret" Weapon 5:57 Things Get Dangerous 7:45 Teamwork Makes the Dream Work 9:42 Austin Says the Word "Sack" Too Much 11:08 Which PC is Better?
